description.content:
Name the chat "P1 - <client name> - Issue/Ticket#

Create with the following members:
SDM
Dispatch
CSM
General Manager (Priscila)
Assigned Engineer (The engineer who first responded to the issue, or the engineer who this P1 ticket is assigned to)
Primary Technical Engineer (Ideally the Primary Senior engineer (T3) for the client. If unavailable, a T3 available, familiar with the issue and able to support)

Post this process link: https://lancom.itglue.com/5537/docs/2515250

items.instruction: Customer Liaison Advised of issue and communication strategy

description.content:
Reach out to the primary customer contact, or the person who logged the ticket to ensure they are aware:
- We are working on the issue
- What our communication timeline will be
- Gather if any other contacts need to be included in comms

The assigned engineer will need his workload cleared to ensure they are able to focus on this issue.  Dispatch should review their schedule and either move the tickets to another engineer, reschedule the tasks or advise SDM that the assigned engineer may not be the best resource to work this P1.

items.instruction: [Completion] Impacted users have been contacted and confirmed working OK.
[Completion] Incident report has been filled out and checked off by Account Management.

description.content:
Once the issue is resolved, an incident report is created, detailing the following
What went wrong
Root cause analysis
What learnings to ensure it doesn't happen again
What services/product recommendations
What changes are required
How could we minimize this in the future
The incident report must be submitted within 24 hours after the incident

Templates and further instruction can be found here: https://lancom.itglue.com/5537/docs/2515250

items.instruction: [Completion] Any relevant preventative tickets have been logged.
